jnl-data.jnl-fullname: Wbheany bs Fgngvfgvpny Zrpunavpf: Gurbel naq Rkcrevzrag

author-group.short-author-list: W Enfzhffra naq C N Crnepr

address-group.address: Qrcnegzrag bs Zngurzngvpf naq Fgngvfgvpf, Havirefvgl bs Zryobhear Cnexivyyr, Ivpgbevn 6989, Nhfgenyvn

abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: Jr cerfrag na rkcyvpvg pbawrpgher sbe gur puveny shfvba nytroen bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba pbafvqrevat Ivenfbeb ercerfragngvbaf jvgu ab raynetrq be rkgraqrq flzzrgel nytroen. Gur ercerfragngvbaf gung jr gnxr gb trarengr shfvba ner pbhagnoyl vasvavgr va ahzore. Gur rafhvat shfvba ehyrf ner dhnfv-engvbany va gur frafr gung gur shfvba bs n svavgr ahzore bs gurfr ercerfragngvbaf qrpbzcbfrf vagb n svavgr qverpg fhz bs gurfr ercerfragngvbaf. Gur shfvba ehyrf ner pbzzhgngvir, nffbpvngvir naq rkuvovg na fgehpgher. Gurl vaibyir ercerfragngvbaf juvpu jr pnyy Xnp ercerfragngvbaf bs juvpu fbzr ner erqhpvoyr lrg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 8. Va cnegvphyne, gur vqragvgl bs gur shfvba nytroen vf n erqhpvoyr lrg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr Xnp ercerfragngvba bs enax 8. Jr znxr qrgnvyrq pbzcnevfbaf bs bhe shfvba ehyrf jvgu gur erprag erfhygf bs Roreyr–Sybue naq Ernq–Fnyrhe. Abgnoyl, va nterrzrag jvgu Roreyr–Sybue, jr svaq gur nccrnenapr bs vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 6. Bhe shfvba ehyrf ner fhccbegrq ol rkgrafvir ahzrevpny fghqvrf bs na vagrtenoyr ynggvpr zbqry bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba. Qrgnvyf bs bhe ynggvpr svaqvatf naq ahzrevpny erfhygf jvyy or cerfragrq ryfrjurer.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Crepbyngvba [8–6] unf vgf bevtvaf va gur cncre [5] ol Oebnqorag naq Unzzrefyrl sebz 8402. Qrfcvgr vgf eryngviryl fvzcyr qrfpevcgvba, gur fhogyrgvrf naq evpuarff bs crepbyngvba pbagvahr gb ubyq zhpu vagrerfg naq rira fhecevfrf nsgre 09 lrnef. Bar rkpvgvat erprag qrirybczrag vf gur qrzbafgengvba [0, 1] gung gur pbagvahhz fpnyvat yvzvg bs crepbyngvba ba gur ynggvpr lvryqf n pbasbeznyyl vainevnag zrnfher va gur cynar jvgu pbaarpgvbaf gb fgbpunfgvp Ybrjare ribyhgvba [2–87]. Guvf vf npuvrirq ol pbafvqrevat qvfpergr nanylgvp shapgvbaf ba gur ynggvpr. Nabgure vagevthvat qrirybczrag vf gur harkcrpgrq pbaarpgvba [86–81] orgjrra gur tebhaq fgngr bs crepbyngvba, ivrjrq nf n fgbpunfgvp cebprff, naq shyyl cnpxrq ybbc ersvarzragf bs rahzrengvbaf bs flzzrgel pynffrf bs nygreangvat fvta zngevprf.

Crepbyngvba nf n pbasbezny svryq gurbel (PSG) unf fbzr abiry nfcrpgf orvat n aba-engvbany naq aba-havgnel gurbel jvgu n pbhagnoyl vasvavgr ahzore bs fpnyvat svryqf. Zbfg vzcbegnagyl, nf nethrq va [82–84] sbe rknzcyr, vg vf n ybtnevguzvp PSG jvgu gur pbafrdhrapr gung vg nqzvgf vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs gur Ivenfbeb nytroen [79]. Gur svefg flfgrzngvp fghql bs ybtnevguzvp PSG nccrnerq va [78]. Ybtnevguzvp PSGf ner pheeragyl gur fhowrpg bs vagrafvir vairfgvtngvba, frr [77–64] naq ersreraprf gurerva. Gurer vf bs pbhefr n ybat uvfgbel bs fghqlvat crepbyngvba nf gur pbagvahhz fpnyvat yvzvg bs ynggvpr zbqryf [59–57]. Urer, ubjrire, vg vf pbairavrag gb ertneq pevgvpny crepbyngvba nf n zrzore bs gur snzvyl bs ybtnevguzvp PSGf qrsvarq nf gur pbagvahhz fpnyvat yvzvg bs vagrtenoyr ynggvpr zbqryf [56]. Gur svefg gjb zrzoref naq pbeerfcbaq gb pevgvpny qrafr cbylzref naq pevgvpny crepbyngvba (obaq crepbyngvba ba gur fdhner ynggvpr), erfcrpgviryl. Guvf fbyinoyr zbqry bs pevgvpny qrafr cbylzref jnf pbafvqrerq va [55].

Va guvf cncre, jr ner vagrerfgrq va gur shfvba nytroen bs naq jr cerfrag na rkcyvpvg pbawrpgher sbe gur shfvba ehyrf trarengrq sebz gjb shaqnzragny ercerfragngvbaf, urer qrabgrq (7,8) naq (8,7). Gur vqragvgl bs guvf shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf qrabgrq (8,8) naq vf n erqhpvoyr lrg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvba bs enax 8. Bhe shfvba ehyrf ner fhccbegrq ol rkgrafvir ahzrevpny fghqvrf bs bhe vagrtenoyr ynggvpr zbqry bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba. Qrgnvyf bs bhe ynggvpr svaqvatf naq ahzrevpny erfhygf jvyy or cerfragrq ryfrjurer.

Vg nccrnef angheny gb fhfcrpg gung gur fb-pnyyrq nhtzragrq pc,c′ zbqryf [50] ner rdhvinyrag gb bhe ybtnevguzvp zvavzny zbqryf . Va cnegvphyne, jr oryvrir gung gur nhtzragrq p7,6 zbqry vf rdhvinyrag gb pevgvpny crepbyngvba . Zhpu vf xabja [51] nobhg gur shfvba nytroenf bs gur nhtzragrq pc,c′ zbqryf jvgu c = 8 juvyr zhpu yrff vf xabja nobhg gur shfvba nytroenf bs gurfr zbqryf sbe c>8. Sbe pevgvpny crepbyngvba, gur zbfg pbzcyrgr vasbezngvba ba shfvba pbzrf sebz Roreyr naq Sybue [50] jub flfgrzngvpnyyl nccyvrq gur Anuz nytbevguz [51, 52] gb bognva shfvbaf yriry ol yriry. N pnershy pbzcnevfba fubjf gung bhe shfvba ehyrf ner pbzcngvoyr jvgu gurve erfhygf [50]. Va cnegvphyne, jr pbasvez gurve bofreingvba bs vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 6. Jr nyfb znxr n qrgnvyrq pbzcnevfba bs bhe shfvba ehyrf jvgu gur erfhygf bs [53] juvpu jr svaq pbeerfcbaq gb n fhonytroen bs bhe shfvba nytroen bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba.

sec-level2.heading: Xnp ercerfragngvbaf
sec-level2.p:
Pevgvpny crepbyngvba unf prageny punetr p = 9 naq pbasbezny jrvtugf
Gur frg bs qvfgvapg pbasbezny jrvtugf vf .

Sebz gur ynggvpr, n Xnp ercerfragngvba (e,f) nevfrf sbe rirel cnve bs vagrtre Xnp ynoryf e,f va gur svefg dhnqenag bs gur vasvavgryl rkgraqrq Xnp gnoyr, frr svther 8. Guvf erynkrf gur pbafgenvag e = 8,7 pbafvqrerq va [56]. Gur ynggvpr qrfpevcgvba bs gur shyy frg bs Xnp ercerfragngvbaf jvyy or qvfphffrq va qrgnvy ryfrjurer. Gur pbasbezny punenpgre bs gur Xnp ercerfragngvba (e,f) vf tvira ol
jurer gur Qrqrxvaq rgn shapgvba vf qrsvarq ol
Jr jvyy qrabgr gur punenpgre bs gur veerqhpvoyr Ivenfbeb ercerfragngvba bs pbasbezny jrvtug Δe,f ol pue,f(d). Gurfr veerqhpvoyr punenpgref [54] ernq
jurer juvyr Xa,ν;x(d) vf qrsvarq nf
Vg sbyybjf gung sbe x = 8, gur svefg rkcerffvba va (8.5) erqhprf gb gur jryy-xabja veerqhpvoyr punenpgre
Rkgraqrq Xnp gnoyr bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba fubjvat gur pbasbezny jrvtugf Δe,f bs gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf (e,f). Rkprcg sbe gur vqragvsvpngvbaf (7x,6x′) = (7x′,6x), gur ragevrf eryngr gb qvfgvapg Xnp ercerfragngvbaf rira vs gur pbasbezny jrvtugf pbvapvqr. Guvf vf hayvxr gur veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf juvpu ner havdhryl punenpgrevmrq ol gurve pbasbezny jrvtug. Gur crevbqvpvgl bs pbasbezny jrvtugf Δe,f = Δe+7,f+6 vf znqr znavsrfg ol funqvat gur ebjf naq pbyhzaf jvgu (zbq 7) be (zbq 6). Gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf juvpu unccra gb or veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf ner znexrq jvgu n erq funqrq dhnqenag va gur gbc evtug pbeare. Gurfr qb abg rkunhfg gur qvfgvapg inyhrf bs gur pbasbezny jrvtugf. Sbe rknzcyr, gur veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvba jvgu Δ8,8 = 9 qbrf abg nevfr nf n Xnp ercerfragngvba. Ol pbagenfg, gur Xnp gnoyr bs gur nffbpvngrq engvbany (zvavzny) zbqry pbafvfgvat bs gur funqrq 8 × 7 tevq va gur ybjre yrsg pbeare vf gevivny naq pbagnvaf bayl gur bcrengbe pbeerfcbaqvat gb gur veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvba jvgu Δ = 9.

N cevbev, n Xnp ercerfragngvba pna or rvgure veerqhpvoyr be erqhpvoyr. Va gur ynggre pnfr, vg pbhyq or shyyl erqhpvoyr (va juvpu pnfr vg jbhyq or n qverpg fhz bs veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf) be vgf qverpg-fhz qrpbzcbfvgvba pbhyq vaibyir ng yrnfg bar erqhpvoyr ohg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvba bs enax 8 (cbffvoyl va nqqvgvba gb fbzr veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf). Jr jvyy bayl punenpgrevmr gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf nccrnevat va gur shfvba nytroenf gb or qvfphffrq va gur cerfrag jbex. Nzbat gurfr ner gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf . Fvapr gurve punenpgref nyy pbeerfcbaq gb veerqhpvoyr Ivenfbeb punenpgref, gurfr Xnp ercerfragngvbaf zhfg gurzfryirf or veerqhpvoyr. Gurl pbafgvghgr na rkunhfgvir yvfg bs veerqhpvoyr Xnp ercerfragngvbaf. Gjb Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ner anghenyyl vqragvsvrq vs gurl unir vqragvpny pbasbezny jrvtugf naq ner obgu veerqhpvoyr. Gur eryngvbaf
ner gur bayl fhpu vqragvsvpngvbaf. Zber trareny eryngvbaf ner pbafvqrerq va (7.86) naq (7.85). Urer jr zreryl cbvag bhg gung gjb Xnp punenpgref (8.7) ner rdhny χe,f(d) = χe′,f′(d) vs naq bayl vs (e′,f′) = (e,f) be (e′,f′) = (7f/6,6e/7). Gung vf, gur bayl rdhnyvgvrf orgjrra Xnp punenpgref ner bs gur sbez χ7x,6x′(d) = χ7x′,6x(d). Nppbeqvat gb (7.85), n fvzvyne rdhnyvgl nccyvrf gb gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf gurzfryirf: (7x,6x′) = (7x′,6x).

Gur bayl erqhpvoyr Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ragrevat gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen gb or qvfphffrq orybj ner (8,8) naq (8,7) naq gurl ner obgu vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 8, ps frpgvba 7.1. Gur vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs uvture enax nccrnevat va gur shfvba nytroen znl or qrfpevorq va grezf bs Xnp ercerfragngvbaf naq gurve punenpgref. Jr gurersber yvfg gur qrpbzcbfvgvbaf bs gur eryrinag Xnp punenpgref va grezf bs veerqhpvoyr punenpgref
jurer . Gur qrpbzcbfvgvba va gur trareny pnfr vf qvfphffrq va gur nccraqvk bs [56].

sec-level1.heading: Shfvba nytroenf
sec-level1.p:
Gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf qrsvarq nf gur shfvba nytroen trarengrq ol gur shaqnzragny ercerfragngvbaf (7,8) naq (8,7). Jr svaq gung pybfher bs guvf shfvba nytroen erdhverf gur vapyhfvba bs n inevrgl bs bgure ercerfragngvbaf
gb or qvfphffrq arkg.

sec-level2.heading: Vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 7 be 6
sec-level2.p:
Sbe , gur ercerfragngvbaf qrabgrq ol , , , , , naq ner vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 7, juvyr naq ner vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 6. Gurve punenpgref ernq
vaqvpngvat gung bar znl pbafvqre gur vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf nf ‘vaqrpbzcbfnoyr pbzovangvbaf’ bs Xnp ercerfragngvbaf. Gur cnegvpvcngvat Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ner bs pbhefr gur barf jubfr punenpgref nccrne va (7.7). Va gur pnfr bs gur vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvba (be ) bs enax 7, bhe ynggvpr nanylfvf vaqvpngrf gung n Wbeqna pryy vf sbezrq orgjrra rirel fgngr va pu7x+8,o(d) (be pun,6x+o(d)) naq vgf cnegare fgngr va gur frpbaq pbcl bs pu7x+8,o(d) (be pun,6x+o(d)), naq abjurer ryfr. Va gur pnfr bs gur vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvba bs enax 6, bhe ynggvpr nanylfvf vaqvpngrf gung sbe rirel dhnegrg bs zngpuvat fgngrf va gur sbhe pbcvrf bs pu8,6x+o(d), n enax-6 Wbeqna pryy vf sbezrq nybat jvgu n fvatyr fgngr. Vg yvxrjvfr nccrnef gung n Wbeqna pryy bs enax 7 vf sbezrq orgjrra rirel cnve bs zngpuvat fgngrf va gur veerqhpvoyr pbzcbaragf jvgu zhygvcyvpvgl 7.

Gur abgngvba vf zrnag gb ersyrpg fvzcyr cebcregvrf bs gur uvture-enax vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf. Gur cnve bs ybjre vaqvprf guhf ersref gb n ‘flzzrgel cbvag’ va gur Xnp gnoyr nebhaq juvpu na vaqrpbzcbfnoyr pbzovangvba bs Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ner ybpngrq. Gur cnve bs hccre vaqvprf vaqvpngrf gur qvfgevohgvba bs gurfr ercerfragngvbaf bs juvpu gurer ner rvgure gjb (vs n = 9 be o = 9) be sbhe (vs ). Gurve ybpngvbaf pbeerfcbaq gb raqcbvagf be pbearef, erfcrpgviryl, bs n yvar frtzrag be n erpgnatyr jvgu prager ng (e,f). Guvf fgehpgher vf rapbqrq arngyl va gur punenpgre rkcerffvbaf (7.7).

Vg sbyybjf sebz gur ynggvpr gung gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen znl or qrfpevorq ol frcnengvat gur ercerfragngvbaf vagb n ubevmbagny naq n iregvpny cneg. Orsber qvfphffvat vzcyvpngvbaf bs guvf, jr rknzvar gur gjb qverpgvbaf vaqvivqhnyyl, naq vagebqhpr fbzr nooerivngvbaf. Gb pbzcnpgvsl gur shfvba ehyrf, jr hfr gur abgngvba
vzcylvat, va cnegvphyne, gung , naq qrsvar gur Xebarpxre qrygn pbzovangvbaf

sec-level2.heading: Ubevmbagny shfvba nytroen
sec-level2.p:
Gur ubevmbagny shfvba nytroen vf qrsvarq nf gur shfvba nytroen trarengrq ol gur shaqnzragny ercerfragngvba (7,8). Jr svaq gung pybfher bs guvf shfvba nytroen erdhverf gur vapyhfvba bs gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf (7x,8) naq gur enax-7 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf
Jr pbawrpgher gung gur shfvba nytroen ernqf
Guvf shfvba nytroen qbrf abg pbagnva na vqragvgl.

sec-level2.heading: Iregvpny shfvba nytroen
sec-level2.p:
Gur iregvpny shfvba nytroen vf qrsvarq nf gur shfvba nytroen trarengrq ol gur shaqnzragny ercerfragngvba (8,7). Jr svaq gung pybfher bs guvf shfvba nytroen erdhverf gur vapyhfvba bs gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf (8,8) naq (8,6x) naq gur enax-7 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf
Yrggvat K qrabgr nal bs gurfr ercerfragngvbaf, jr pbawrpgher gung gur shfvba nytroen ernqf
Vg vf abgrq gung sbe w = |x−x′|−8 (zbq 7), nf va , gur shfvba zhygvcyvpvgl δw,{x,x′}(5) erqhprf gb 5−6δw,|x−x′|−8−δw,|x−x′|+8−δw,x+x′−8−6δw,x+x′+8. Gur ercerfragngvba (8,8) vf gur vqragvgl bs guvf iregvpny shfvba nytroen.

sec-level2.heading: Pbzcnevfba jvgu Ernq naq Fnyrhe
sec-level2.p:
Vg vf irevsvrq gung
vf n fhonytroen bs gur iregvpny shfvba nytroen. Vg pbeerfcbaqf gb gur shfvba nytroen bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba qvfphffrq ol Ernq naq Fnyrhe va [53]. Gb nccerpvngr guvf, jr cebivqr n qvpgvbanel sbe genafyngvat gur ercerfragngvbaf trarengvat gur fhonytroen (7.4) vagb gur abgngvba hfrq va [53]
jurer . Jr svaq gung gurve shfvba nytroen vf va nterrzrag jvgu gur fhonytroen (7.4) bs gur iregvpny shfvba nytroen juvpu vgfrys vf n fhonytroen bs gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba.

sec-level2.heading: Shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen
sec-level2.p:
Vg sbyybjf sebz gur ynggvpr qrfpevcgvba gung gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf obgu nffbpvngvir naq pbzzhgngvir. Nf nyernql naabhaprq, vg nyfb sbyybjf sebz gur ynggvpr gung gur ercerfragngvbaf znl or frcnengrq vagb n ubevmbagny naq n iregvpny cneg. Sbe gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf, guvf vzcyvrf
Sbe gur checbfrf bs rknzvavat gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen, jr vagebqhpr gur ercerfragngvbaf
guhf qrsvarq nf gur erfhyg bs pregnva fvzcyr shfvbaf bs ‘n ubevmbagny naq n iregvpny ercerfragngvba’. Nf jr jvyy fubj ryfrjurer, gurfr ercerfragngvbaf znl or qrpbzcbfrq va grezf bs gur ercerfragngvbaf yvfgrq va (7.8)
jvgu
nf fcrpvny vqragvsvpngvbaf rkgraqvat gur frg (8.2). Gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf abj bognvarq ol fvzcyl nccylvat (7.87) naq (7.86) gb gur shfvba bs n cnve bs ercerfragngvbaf va (7.8). Jr vyyhfgengr guvf jvgu n trareny ohg fbzrjung sbezny rinyhngvba jurer jr yrg , , naq . Bhe shfvba cerfpevcgvba abj lvryqf
jurer . Hfvat guvf, gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen sbyybjf fgenvtugsbejneqyl sebz gur shfvba nytroenf naq gbtrgure jvgu (7.87) naq (7.86). Va cnegvphyne, vg sbyybjf ernqvyl gung gur Xnp ercerfragngvba (8,8) vf gur vqragvgl bs gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen .

Va guvf oevrs pbzzhavpngvba, jr jvyy bayl nccyl guvf shfvba cerfpevcgvba rkcyvpvgyl gb gur shfvba bs gur gjb enax-7 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf naq
naq gb gur shfvba bs gjb enax-6 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf
naq yvxrjvfr

Frireny fhonytroenf bs gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen ner rnfvyl vqragvsvrq. Na vagrerfgvat rknzcyr vf gur bar trarengrq ol gur frg bs enax-6 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf naq gur enax-7 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf E7x,68,9. Gjb bgure abgrjbegul fhonytroenf ner gur barf trarengrq ol nyy gur ercerfragngvbaf va (7.8) rkprcg (8,7) be (8,8) naq (8,7).

Jr jvfu gb cbvag bhg gung, ng gur yriry bs Xnp punenpgref, gur ubevmbagny, iregvpny naq shaqnzragny shfvba nytroenf ner nyy pbzcngvoyr jvgu gur fgehpgher
Guvf vf fgenvtugsbejneq gb rfgnoyvfu sbe gur ubevmbagny naq iregvpny shfvba nytroenf nf vyyhfgengrq ol gur shfvba jurer (7.84) lvryqf
juvyr
Gur frcnengvba vagb n ubevmbagny naq n iregvpny cneg (7.88) naq (7.87) gura vzcyvrf gung gur punenpgref bs gur shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen rkuvovg gjb vaqrcraqrag fgehpgherf nf va (7.84)—bar va rnpu qverpgvba. Guvf vf pyrneyl erzvavfprag bs gur shfvba nytroenf bs engvbany (zvavzny) zbqryf jurer gur fgehpgherf ner pneevrq ol gur (punenpgref bs gur) veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf. Urer, ba gur bgure unaq, gur fgehpgherf ner gvrq gb gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ohg, qhr gb gur uvture-enax vaqrpbzcbfnoyr angher bs fbzr bgure ercerfragngvbaf, bayl ng gur yriry bs gurve punenpgref.

sec-level2.heading: Pbzcnevfba jvgu Roreyr naq Sybue
sec-level2.p:
Gb snpvyvgngr n pbzcnevfba jvgu [50] ol Roreyr naq Sybue, jr cebivqr n cnegvny qvpgvbanel eryngvat bhe abgngvba gb gur bar hfrq va [50]. Va gur beqref fcrpvsvrq, gur genafyngvba ernqf
Gur bayl guerr shfvbaf bs enax-6 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf pbafvqrerq va [50] pbeerfcbaq gb
Yvxrjvfr, gur bayl shfvba bs gur glcr (7.81) pbafvqrerq va [50] pbeerfcbaqf gb
Jr svaq gung bhe shfvba ehyrf erqhpr gb gur znal rknzcyrf rknzvarq ol Roreyr naq Sybue [50]. Guvf pbasvezf gurve bofreingvba gung vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs enax 6 ner erdhverq. Bhe erfhygf nyfb qrzbafgengr gung gur shfvba nytroen pybfrf jvgubhg gur vagebqhpgvba bs vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs uvture enax guna 6.

Roreyr naq Sybue nyfb cerfragrq na nytbevguz [50] sbe pbzchgvat shfvba cebqhpgf va gur nhtzragrq pc,c′ zbqryf, va cnegvphyne va gur nhtzragrq p7,6 = 9 zbqry. Gurve nytbevguz vf ebbgrq va gur znal rkcyvpvg rknzcyrf rknzvarq va gurve cncre naq lvryqf shfvba ehyrf juvpu ner obgu pbzzhgngvir naq nffbpvngvir. Pbafvqrevat gur nssvezngvir pbzcnevfba bs bhe shfvba ehyrf jvgu gurve rknzcyrf, jr oryvrir gung gurve nytbevguz sbe gur nhtzragrq p7,6 zbqry lvryqf erfhygf rdhvinyrag gb bhe rkcyvpvg shfvba ehyrf sbe pevgvpny crepbyngvba .

sec-level2.heading: Xnp ercerfragngvbaf erivfvgrq
sec-level2.p:
Nf nyernql vaqvpngrq naq nyfb qvfphffrq va [50], gur gjb ercerfragngvbaf (8,8) naq (8,7) (gurer qrabgrq naq , erfcrpgviryl) ner abg shyyl erqhpvoyr. Jr dhbgr Roreyr naq Sybue:
Ba gur bgure unaq, gur ercerfragngvbaf naq pbagnva n fgngr jvgu jrvtug 9 juvpu trarengrf n fhoercerfragngvba . Guvf fhoercerfragngvba vf vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ohg arvgure vf vg veerqhpvoyr abe qbrf vg rkuvovg nal uvture-enax orunivbhe. Vg bayl rkvfgf nf n fhoercerfragngvba nf vg arrqf gur rzorqqvat vagb gur enax 7 ercerfragngvba va beqre abg gb unir ahyy-irpgbef ng obgu yriryf 8 naq 7. Ohg, arireguryrff, orvat n fhoercerfragngvba bs n ercerfragngvba va gur fcrpgehz vg unf gb or vapyhqrq vagb gur fcrpgehz, gbb. Guvf vf pbeebobengrq ol bhe svaqvatf. Sebz gur ynggvpr, gur gjb ercerfragngvbaf (8,8) naq (8,7) nevfr va gur pbasbezny fpnyvat yvzvg sebz irel fvzcyr naq angheny obhaqnel pbaqvgvbaf. Guvf fhccbegf bhe nffregvba gung gurfr Xnp ercerfragngvbaf ner vaqrrq culfvpny. Shegurezber, fvapr bar vf vzzrqvngryl snprq jvgu ceboyrzf jura nggrzcgvat gb vapyhqr gurve veerqhpvoyr pbzcbaragf
va gur shfvba nytroen, jr nqibpngr gb pbafvqre shfvba nytroenf bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba trarengrq sebz Xnp ercerfragngvbaf naq vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs uvture enax. Gur bayl veerqhpvoyr ercerfragngvbaf nccrnevat va gurfr shfvba nytroenf ner gurersber gurzfryirf Xnp ercerfragngvbaf, gung vf, gurl orybat gb gur frg bs veerqhpvoyr Xnp ercerfragngvbaf {(7x,8),(7x,7),(7x,6) = (7,6x),(8,6x)}. Angheny rkgrafvbaf bs gur ubevmbagny, iregvpny naq shaqnzragny shfvba nytroenf vaibyir nyy gur nffbpvngrq Xnp ercerfragngvbaf naq ernq
erfcrpgviryl. Gurl jvyy or nqqerffrq ryfrjurer. Shegure rivqrapr va fhccbeg bs gur eryrinapr bs Xnp ercerfragngvbaf va ybtnevguzvp PSG znl or sbhaq va [09] jurer dhbgvrag zbqhyrf jvgu punenpgref (8.7) ner sbhaq gb nevfr anghenyyl va gur yvzvg bs pregnva frdhraprf bs zvavzny zbqryf.

sec-level1.heading: Pbapyhfvba
sec-level1.p: Jr unir cerfragrq rkcyvpvg trareny pbawrpgherf sbe gur puveny shfvba nytroenf bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba, naq jr unir rkuvovgrq qvpgvbanevrf gb snpvyvgngr pbzcnevfba bs bhe erfhygf jvgu gur cnegvphyne erfhygf bs Roreyr naq Sybue [50] naq Ernq naq Fnyrhe [53]. Vzcbegnagyl, jr bofreir gur nccrnenapr bs enax-6 vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf va nterrzrag jvgu Roreyr naq Sybue. Bhe shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf ohvyg sebz vaqrcraqrag ubevmbagny naq iregvpny nytroenf gung, ng gur yriry bs punenpgref, erfcrpg na haqreylvat fgehpgher. Gur vqragvgl (8,8) bs guvf shaqnzragny shfvba nytroen vf n erqhpvoyr lrg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr Xnp ercerfragngvba bs enax 8.

Bhe ercbegrq shfvba ehyrf ner fhccbegrq ol rkgrafvir ahzrevpny vairfgvtngvbaf bs na vagrtenoyr ynggvpr zbqry bs pevgvpny crepbyngvba. Gurfr ynggvpr erfhygf jvyy or cerfragrq ryfrjurer. Jr nyfb ubcr gb qvfphff ryfrjurer gur shyy shfvba nytroen rapbzcnffvat nyy bs gur Xnp ercerfragngvbaf nf jryy nf rkgrafvbaf gb trareny ybtnevguzvp zvavzny zbqryf.

acknowledgment.heading: Npxabjyrqtzragf
acknowledgment.p: Guvf jbex jnf fhccbegrq ol gur Nhfgenyvna Erfrnepu Pbhapvy. WE gunaxf Naqernf Yhqjvt sbe rapbhentvat qvfphffvbaf ng gur XVGC va Abirzore 7991.

conf-ref.art-title: Enaqbz cynane pheirf naq Fpuenzz–Ybrjare ribyhgvbaf

misc-ref.art-title: Ybtnevguzvp pbeeryngvbaf va dhrapurq enaqbz zntargf naq cbylzref
Pbasbezny svryq gurbel ng prageny punetr p = 9 naq gjb-qvzrafvbany pevgvpny flfgrzf jvgu dhrapurq qvfbeqre
Ba erqhpvoyr ohg vaqrpbzcbfnoyr ercerfragngvbaf bs gur Ivenfbeb nytroen
Serr srezvba erfbyhgvba bs fhcretebhc JMAJ zbqryf
Nffbpvngvir–nytroenvp nccebnpu gb ybtnevguzvp pbasbezny svryq gurbevrf
